price: Агар ўзлари ҳақдор бўлсалар, унга бўйсуниб келадилар.
arabic: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ يَأۡتُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مُذۡعِنِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in yakun lahumu al-ḥaqu yatū ilayhi mudh'ʿinīna
